metadata.Title: CVE-2013-4156 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description:
Apache OpenOffice.org (OOo) before 4.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory corruption) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted element in an OOXML document file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-4156` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libreoffice-mysql-connector - 1:4.2.3~rc3-0ubuntu2
No subscription required

libreoffice-wiki-publisher - 1:4.2.3~rc3-0ubuntu2
No subscription required
